website_summaries.verdict: A moisturizing, natural shampoo that's gentle on skin and hair.
pros: Contains natural ingredients that moisturize and nourish skin
Doubles as body wash and can also be used as a massage oil
cons: Some users don't like how it smells

customer_reviews.title: Beware of watery leaky product - Buy from Shea Moisture not from this vendor.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for just under 5 years for my daughter with sensitive skin, and am very familiar with it. The product shipped by this vendor is NOT the same as the product from Shea Moisture. The foil top was half removed and the liquid inside is a greyish yellow watered-down liquid and not anywhere near the thick consistency of the product or even a regular shampoo. I am not even going to try using either of the two bottles on me first. There are other buyers who have offered similar reviews - I should have heeded their warning. Don't make the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: WATERED DOWN! ONLY BUY FROM SHEA MOISTURE!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this soap for over a year for my daughter. I’ve purchased it multiple times through Amazon too. This time, from this company Ox-whatever, it was watered down! The seal on the bottles were easily removed and when comparing the rest of a bottle I have with this one, the color of the ones that came today was a grayish yellow. The original is a thick gold color. These WILL be returned. This is so frustrating!!!!! Something to remember, it’s probably best to just purchase it from ONLY Shea Moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product IF you actually get the right one
customer_reviews.text: I’m so upset. I’ve been using this soap for over 2 years as it is awesome and smells amazing. The order I just received was NOT the right product. The color was way lighter, the consistency was watery and when we unscrewed the cap, the foil seal was already lifted. So...what is the soap mixed with?? Obviously, we’re returning these but I’m disappointed and concerned as a parent. To prove my point, I bought a bottle from the store which looks/smells perfect. The tampered product is the one on the left. WTH??
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Family

customer_reviews.title: Shady business practice going on somewhere
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered from the same company through Amazon and used this shampoo exclusively for a long time and never had any trouble. But the last two bottles sent were not even close to the same as all previous orders. The shampoo was super watery, smelled completely different, and literally did not work to clean our hair. It was as if the original product had been replaced by something cheaper. Same ingredient list and bottle but definitely NOT the same product as it has been for a year plus. We won’t be ordering it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Miller

customer_reviews.title: Changed formula. Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a few years and adored it when I first found it. It smells amazing and doesn't have harmful chemicals. Then, Shea Moisture was bought by Unilever and the formula changed to a watered-down, not-as-great product. I didn't love the new product, but it was ok enough that I didn't seek out a replacement. However, it seems they have changed the formula yet again, and this time, it's garbage. The body wash is murky and smells "off", like the oils have expired. I won't be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells sooo good. However
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells sooo good. However, I'm giving it two stars because they leaked all over the bag they were in. The foil that covers the top of the bottles was not attached, which means they might have been open previously. When buying soap for a baby, I definitely would not buy an unsealed bottle. Also, The label on the bottle is slightly different, as well as the ingredient list. The company might have changed the product slightly, but this should be updated, especially since this is typically a product that health-conscious parents and parents of babies with allergies look to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rigg

customer_reviews.title: Warning!  Bought from Amazon mktplc vendor 'C&C Discount'. Product was tampered with.
customer_reviews.text: To be clear: I love Shea Moisture's ACTUAL product. Smells great/gentle on sensitive kiddos' skin. Echoing others : bought a 2 pack from C&C Discount. Product arrived cloudy and off color. I let it sit for a month and solids settled at bottom. It ended up with an orangeish tint/white (gray? ) sledge at the bottom. Foil tamper seal had been cut/ replaced. Buyer beware of the vendor source. I might even recommend only buying from local retailers at this point. This product should be close in appearance to classic light yellow Johnson/Johnson baby shampoo-no junk floating or sitting at the bottom. *Requested refund and got it instantly - no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Ode123

customer_reviews.title: Be aware! This is not Shea Moisture Shampoo!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using products of Shea Moisture for a decade and I love clean ingredients they made of. I know very well the smell, color and physical appearance of their products. I usually bought them at Target or CVS but lately I do all my shopping online and Amazon is my go to. So when I received this product and used it on my child I knew right away it was heavily diluted and/ or mixed something other then Shea Moisture. I was incredibly upset because this is baby shampoo! And God knows what chemicals were added!!!!! Do not buy it for the sake of your child’s health!
customer_reviews.author: Almusha

customer_reviews.title: Thin and runny
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this baby wash for four years at the grocery store and I love it. This stuff that I just ordered off amazon however is not the same quality as the stuff I have been buying. It is super thin and runny. Not thick like the old stuff. The old bottles lasted me 6 months with three kids and this runny stuff goes super fast. I don’t know how or why it is different but I don’t recommend buying it here. I will stick with buying it at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I use this product on our 1 and 2 year old toddlers and we love it
customer_reviews.text: We were trying to find a product that would not dry out our 1 and 2 year old toddlers skin and hair and we believe this is it. Our son has a beautifully thick Afro and our daughter has really curly hair, so it was important to use that whatever product we used would not strip their hair of its natural oils and maintain the texture in the process. Since starting to use this product, not only has there hair been hydrated but there skin as well. They no longer get extremely dry and ashy, there skin is a lot more moisturized. We will definitely purchase again and recommend to others as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sherika Martin

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, but it is ALWAYS LEAKING every time I buy it. Doesn't matter if it's from the store or Amazon. I've gotten used to it and use it anyway (I threw it out the first few times because it weirded me out)... but I'd really like the company to fix the darn leaking issue. Still, love that it's natural and effective. I use this as shampoo/body wash for myself and my toddler as well as my baby!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: KNOCK OFF - DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is a knock off. Doesn't smell like the real deal Shea moisture product,. I had one that was running low, which I bought from Target. I'm so upset; I used it on my baby and I have no idea what it was. It has a plastic smell. It's not a Shea moisture product event the color of the package is slightly off. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ocitti

customer_reviews.title: Something is not right.......
customer_reviews.text: I have used this soap on my kids for 5+ years and have never seen it milky and opaque like it arrived yesterday.. not sure what is wrong with it but this picture shows the wash on the left that I bought from Target and the one on the right what I received yesterday.. This is going back and going forward I will only buy directly from Shea Moisture, not this re-seller ever again.. the $1.00 savings is not worth it...
customer_reviews.author: Jodie M. Marsilio

customer_reviews.title: Costly but EXTREMELY WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: I had been using Johnson & Johnson shampoo on my baby’s hair and dirt was still left behind. I wanted to try a different shampoo. This worked so well with my child’s texture of hair. I don’t use it as a body wash, only as shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful
customer_reviews.text: I love Shea moisture. In fact I love it so much it's my main hair, skin and hygiene brand. But this smells faintly like bleach and it makes me extremely uneasy. They could be due for a change!
customer_reviews.author: Mondre & Jessie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Changed their formula
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo/bath wash has been my go-to for about 10 years but recently the formulation was changed and not for the better. This new version does not rinse clean and leaves an oily feeling. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ObutiAMcalm

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite. Gentle and smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: The scent is really, really good and long lasting, but subtle and not over powering. Very gentle product, cleans well but never caused any problems on my kid who has a very sensitive skin. This product has been a favorite in our household!
customer_reviews.author: Galadriel

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, Effective for Bath and Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a product intended for babies, I am an adult woman and find it very effective for use in the shower for bathing, as well as shampooing. It is gentle, while very effective for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: RPurser

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: One of the only baby shampoos that is neither overpowering or chemical laden. I have bought this shampoo for 6 out of 7 of my kids, for 11 years now, and I’ll never buy a different baby shampoo. I love how gently this cleans and how calming and soothing the smell is!
customer_reviews.author: gigglebugmama

customer_reviews.title: Sham Garbage. Someone is faking this great product.
customer_reviews.text: Not the original product. This is watered down. You go to pour some out and it just spills all the contents right down the drain. Garbage. No stars. Minus stars. F+
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: changes need to be made. not the same product we've been getting. shame on you.
customer_reviews.author: dennis neiditch

customer_reviews.title: Tampered Product. Fraud Alert
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed as the product was obviously tampered with as this particular soap is normally a golden yellow color but it arrived near white and watered down. The fact that I intended to wash my 11 Month Old Baby with this soap just infuriates me. WTF?!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kellett

customer_reviews.title: Something's rotten in Denmark...
customer_reviews.text: When I unpacked the box that this shampoo was in, I thought that they had been shaken up so much that they were a cloudy, watery consistency. Nope! They seem to be watered down. I gave them 2 stars because they have the same fantastic smell. I would not order them online again.
customer_reviews.author: U.P. North

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: The formula for this has been changed obviously. Normal color was a golden color and what I received was white like milk. Not what I have been used too.
customer_reviews.author: Onlythebest

customer_reviews.title: Very Watery
customer_reviews.text: This is not an original product. Very watery unlike the ones sold in the stores. I have been using this product for 4years and the constituency of thos particular one is not the the same as others. It is very very light.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki L.

customer_reviews.title: Could this be a fake?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for almost 2 years and always loved it!. This recent purchase, however, has me wondering if I ordered from a company sending fake product?? Or possibly they don’t know it’s fake? This time it smelled diffent, was watery, didn’t suds up and the water had a blue tint. I drained it immediately and will throw and find again locally in a market. This is the first time I’ve had an issue ordering off Amazon. Hopefully it was a fluke!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: now - great mild scent
customer_reviews.text: We have been using for year, now - great mild scent, never any problems or reactions with my baby's/child's skin, even mommy uses this - is safer according to EWG than most others - EWG looks in detail at ingredients and rates their safety to people and environment. Will keep buying this.
customer_reviews.author: *Research*Mama*

customer_reviews.title: First time I was disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this soap and brand for years and have loved it! Unfortunately this batch didn’t have the same scent I’m used to. Seems as if they left out some essential oils or just didn’t use enough?
customer_reviews.author: Teri Sferlazza

customer_reviews.title: SHAME TICKET!!!
customer_reviews.text: SHAME ON YOU!!! this is not the original Shea Moisture!! it is very watered down and very light in color compared to the true product. it is obvious that the seal was opened too. I will be returning!!!
customer_reviews.author: nicole braud

customer_reviews.title: residue
customer_reviews.text: The product leaves a thick residue on the tub. I just opened it last night and regret that I didn’t use it sooner bc I cannot return it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Baby smell!
customer_reviews.text: Used this when my 4 year old was a baby, and got it again for our new baby. Lathers well, good cleansing without over drying and it smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Roo99Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Something off about this product, buy elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other posters. This is not the same as the regular product, which I have been using since my kiddo was born. I didn’t think to ask for a refund, but I think I will now seeing all these similar posts. I stopped using it bc it looks different and it is very slimy. Nothing like the regular version of this product. Clearly something off with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: KCP

customer_reviews.title: BURNS EYES BADLY
customer_reviews.text: I actually loved this stuff until I opened up the bottle one night and it squirted me in the eye. It stung like acid for hours even after thoroughly washing my eyes out. I can’t even imagine how my baby would feel if this got in his eyes. Buyers beware, it’s not tear free.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Serure

customer_reviews.title: The best natural body wash for baby!
customer_reviews.text: I had to try every single natural/organic baby wash out there. This is the best. It makes nice bubbles, it smells amazing, I'm thinking about using it as my own body wash! Shea moisture has a ton of amazing products. An old family business and fair trade. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: An amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This product is so amazing. It's the only one we use on our daughter and she's 16 months now. Very gentle and moisturizes her skin
customer_reviews.author: Jaimelyn Bell

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAME.
customer_reviews.text: NOT SAME PRODUCT Bought in Target, and has the rich sweet scent. This one smells like chemicals... Not sure why. I know scent and consistency can vary, but this ONLY happens to me when bought through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Miri

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY this product from here. I have been using this for years on my kids. I instant knew that this was not the real shea moisture. It is so light and does not smell anything even remotely close to what the real product smells like.
customer_reviews.author: judy duncan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This oil is slightly thicker then babyoil, not as runny. I noticed our skin is not itchy. Really helps for dry skin & exima
customer_reviews.author: Mtnurse

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love the smell with my girls and now I’m using it too. Fragrance stay on your hair and skin lasts longer, smooth skin too
customer_reviews.author: ELSIE MIGUELev

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as what I have purchased in stores!!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not the same product that I have purchased for years at the store. While it has the same label, the soap has a white/creamy/opaque appearance to it (normally dark/translucent). Today is the first time I used it and when I poured it in the bath it came out SUPER runny/watery. There are also white flaky/chunks floating in the tub. This is NOT the same product I am used to and love. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good - just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Smell is good. Container is solid. But leaves the skin feeling a bit slimey. Might be good for some, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Galloway

customer_reviews.title: NOT REAL!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS REALLY THE WOTST PURCHASE I HAVE EVER MADE ON AMAZON. I have never ever been soooooo disappointing. The product is so fake and the bottles are HALF WAY Full! Returning it! & I need my money back. Would give it -0 star ⭐️ 😭😭
customer_reviews.author: Frantzsia Norvil

customer_reviews.title: Is it really the same a store bought?
customer_reviews.text: The liquid didn’t look like the photo... it smells similar to the one I buy in the store but the vescocity of it is totally different... mine was a tan white color
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This is for sure our go-to body wash! Our entire family uses this, not just our toddler. It smells amazing, cleans well, can be used for body and hair, and doesn’t contain horrible ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Hummingbird Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Watery texture
customer_reviews.text: Product has an ultra watery texture and protected seal was broken on both bottles
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Skin SO soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for baby who has very mild eczema and I use it for myself too because it’s so nice without leaving a residue
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Bell

customer_reviews.title: Shut up and take my money.
customer_reviews.text: Best baby soap on the market hands down. Perfect for all skin types. Smells amazing, soft, warm, perfect. Will only buy this from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Morguebabe

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong...
customer_reviews.text: We love this stuff. Have bought it for years.... It never looks like this.... Not even sure if I should use it? Anyone know?
customer_reviews.author: breeze

customer_reviews.title: My all time favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite shower wash. It smells wonderful, skidded well, and leaves my skin feeling soft.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie'

customer_reviews.title: I Think I Am A Regular Customer
customer_reviews.text: Feels good and the ladies like it too. I know because they tell me I smell good, and before I used this they never said anything. Ladies have good noses, and I get more smiles from them these days. I'm a happier man than I used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Best I Can

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my sons. They get two baths a day and this keeps their skin soft. The scent is so soft and comforting. It’s unique unlike your typical baby soap
customer_reviews.author: Paula Durancik

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Very, very disappointed! The formula has been changed. It is now very light in color and watered down in texture. The scent that was so delicious is gone. Returning! Very sad— I’ve been buying this product for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best all-around baby wash.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for a few years after trying many brands. This lathers well. Doesn't seem to dry out our kids' skin or hair. It seems very concentrated, so a bottle lasts us quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: S. Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Super nice! Very good scent and leaves the baby's ...
customer_reviews.text: Super nice! Very good scent and leaves the baby's skin really soft. The soap is concentrated so you only need a small amount. The only con would be the amount of time to be shipped. It took six weeks from my order to delivery.
customer_reviews.author: DWallingford

customer_reviews.title: A great cruelty free soap for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby and I use this daily despite being adults because it smells AH-mazing and is gentle enough for pretty much anything. I also use this to clean my makeup brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Daizy4070

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on both my 5-year-old and two month old. It smells SO GOOD and the smell lasts for a long time. The lather is thick, so you only need a little. I will definitely keep using this product on my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Angela F

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: I really love the way this body wash smells for babies
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Not real! Don’t get scammed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a knock off. Not the real thing. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Author Becky Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased this before, will purchase again. Smells great, cleans, makes me happy knowing I'm not putting any strange chemicals on my baby's skin. LOVE this.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gunter

customer_reviews.title: but has a nice smell and washes our kids well without drying them ...
customer_reviews.text: Not tear free, so be warned, but has a nice smell and washes our kids well without drying them out too much.
customer_reviews.author: BecomingSarah

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating and gentle
customer_reviews.text: Works great and keep my baby nice and soft. Switched to this from Honest because it made my LO splotchy and dry. No break outs, splotchiness, or dryness (we always follow with cerave cream).
customer_reviews.author: Jon C.

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: My 6-year-old kid has been using this since she was born. I will use this as long as she wants. Tear-free, Great fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Laserking19

customer_reviews.title: Received this item today and I was so disappointed!! One of the bottles was open so ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this item today and I was so disappointed!! One of the bottles was open so it was liking and as you see in the picture same product but totally different colors . got it for my kids and now I'm scared to use it .it seems like one of them past the expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: Dvir H.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for a baby!!
customer_reviews.text: Is not recommended for baby’s, my baby couldn’t stop crying, must be tears less however is not, no delicious fragrance, nothing that I expected actually. I cannot recommended.
customer_reviews.author: pablo enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my son's hair!
customer_reviews.text: My son was born with a head full of soft, curly hair and this shampoo has kept it that way. It also smells awesome! I've used Shea Moisture hair products for myself for quite a while so I was excited to find something for my son's hair.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Brown

customer_reviews.title: This has a wonderful subtle smell that goes well with babies
customer_reviews.text: I used to be able to buy this in the grocery store, but not since I moved so I purchased on Amazon. This has a wonderful subtle smell that goes well with babies!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Lou

customer_reviews.title: Smells awesome and great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product,! I have sensitive skin and if it works on a baby, it works on me! Smells awesome and a little goes a long ways, price is good, and it makes my skin feel healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda W.

customer_reviews.title: Good for my daughter with eczema
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 14months and has eczema and her skin is very prone to breakouts. This wash is perfect for her sensitive skin. This is the only body was I use.
customer_reviews.author: janelle

customer_reviews.title: Sm
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I've used it on my son since he was born until now at 2 years
customer_reviews.author: g reader

customer_reviews.title: Love that is all natural.
customer_reviews.text: Best body wash out there with a nice fragrance. This is all my kids use and is cheaper online than in the stores. Wish they had bigger bottles but is all good.
customer_reviews.author: e.adjabeng

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: NOT the real product. I’ve used the REAL one for 3 years, ordered off here for convenience for the first time. Lesson learned! Do not buy this! False advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Kara S

customer_reviews.title: No soap
customer_reviews.text: I use it on the little kids in the bath. I don’t have to worry about getting soap in their eyes and burning.
customer_reviews.author: OrionEng

customer_reviews.title: ... soap is made entirely with natural ingredients and I love the smell so much I've started using it myself ...
customer_reviews.text: This soap is made entirely with natural ingredients and I love the smell so much I've started using it myself in the shower. We love this stuff at my house!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Opened and ungenuine
customer_reviews.text: This product came unsealed, a mess within plastic wrap, and both bottles a different color. It is also runnier than the one i buy at the store so i assume it has something added to it (assuming since it came unsealed) i would not buy again considering i have no idea what waa added to it
customer_reviews.author: laurel rasnick

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit product
customer_reviews.text: I believe these are not genuine products. The color variation was quite different between each bottle I received and as seen in the photo the 13oz bottles are slightly taller than a genuine shea moisture bottle purchased from a local chain supermarket. In the attached photo the genuine product is on the far right. My daughter even had a rash after using this product once.
customer_reviews.author: T.S.

customer_reviews.title: Our whole family uses this, even our 3 year old with a chronic medical condition!
customer_reviews.text: Love this, our whole family uses it! Great natural scent, rinses clean! Love that there are no harsh chemicals in this, only natural ingredients. Also our 3 year old son has unique medical needs and he is on a prescribed Ketogenic diet and this shampoo/bodywash is ok to use on that diet as it doesnt contain sugars and mostly uses natural oils.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra_AZ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of Shea Butter and I use it for a number of things. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: S.R. Giangrosso

customer_reviews.title: We are using this for entire family for over 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: Since I discovered this shampoo 3-4 years ago I used it for my children and me and my husband started using it too lately. I like it that is free of chemicals and has just a subtle scent.
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this from baby shower and have used ever since. If it ain't broke, don't fix it.
customer_reviews.author: drQP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's the best product out there if your little one has eczema or dry skin!
customer_reviews.author: Little Anna

customer_reviews.title: Potentially UNSAFE Tampered Product!
customer_reviews.text: Like the other reviewers here I have used this product for over a year now and even purchased through this very same company on Amazon but received a water-down, tampered version. This is soap marketed towards infants and children. How unsafe is this new faux product. This distributor needs to be held accountable and Shea Moist should be made aware of their compromised product. Wish I could @ them in this review. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it from Oxkom.
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo is very good but the product from seller Oxkom was a disaster. Very watery shampoo. I switched the seller to VitoZone and it is good like the original.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo not tear free
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave it a 3 is because it’s pretty strong for babies my baby screamed because some of it splashed her eye it’s not tear free at all
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo so much I began using it myself. Best stuff out there, smells great organic and cleans.
customer_reviews.author: Renius76

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my kiddos. Smells great and doesn’t irritate their skin
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: It’s organic and healthy for babies skin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the product for quite awhile it’s very gentle
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Our baby - now toddler - has severe exema. We have it on lockdown now and this wash is one of our main tools! Smells great and his skin responds well to it.
customer_reviews.author: PS03

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing..
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing... super hard not to just sit and sniff my baby after a bath lol.. it took us a while to find something that wouldn’t break him out and this was an amazing find!
customer_reviews.author: Jalicia

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: Not the same consistency or smell as the ones you get at Target. Not repurchasing, something is off about this product being sold.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good product but Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Product is good however when I received it it was already spilling once I opened box so a good amount was wasted out of one of the bottles. So that’s product wasted that I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: STORM

customer_reviews.title: Really good product. I use it on my 14 mo ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. I use it on my 14 mo old and 2 yr old after using Johnson Johnson and it took my daughters hair out and stripped it. This product keeps their hair growing and strong!
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff??
customer_reviews.text: This product does not smell like the original bottle I bought from another store. Questioning the integrity of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Crann

customer_reviews.title: Watered down and tampered packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this, and upon unboxing, it seems extremely watered down. So I took the lids off to check packaging, and the seals we're slightly lifted in both bottles. Very frustrating to say the least. Now I see why everyone recommends against buying soaps/hair products online. You never know what you're going to get.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Allen

customer_reviews.title: This product is a touch different from any other Shea Moisture Baby wash I’ve ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: This smells good and all and seems similar to the real shea Moisture baby wash, but something is off with this product. It is watery and way lighter in color than any other bottles of this I’ve ever seen. I’ve been using this product for 6 years and something seems weird about this.
customer_reviews.author: john moore

customer_reviews.title: Gentle Soap with a great scent.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this particular soap for my now 2 year old and I’m happy with the product. I’m glad to see products that raise their quality integrity for children.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Hanley Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Best baby wash ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite baby wash, I use it for everything and it smells amazing and it super gentle too. This stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Lalita Zalelyte

customer_reviews.title: FAKE / KNOCKOFF PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE - This is NOT the real Shea Moisture Baby Wash. This seller (Ox-Something) sent a watered down, cloudy tan colored, off smelling, unsealed version of the product. Returning and kicking myself for thinking all those other reviews wouldn’t be my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McCann

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: my kids and baby love it, good scent. very soft
customer_reviews.author: Ya

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT'S ITS WATERED DOWN/ TAMPERED WITH!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for nearly 10 years and this is NOT what it is usually like, it is lighter in color and clearly watered down. The foil seal is not fixed firm and falls off when the cap is removed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for the skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because of the wonderful soothing fragrance, the moisture for the skin, and the clean, refreshing feeling my skin has after a bath.
customer_reviews.author: Anya Momon

product_meta.title: Shea Moisture Raw Shea Butter Baby Head-to-Toe Wash & Shampoo, 13 Oz, Pack of 2
product_meta.description: Shea Butter - deeply moisturizes and repairs skin with vitamins and essential fatty acids. Argan Oil - is high in Vitamin E, keeps skin soft and smooth.
feature_bullets: Bathe skin gently with this sulfate-free, ultra- moisturizing organic Shea Butter body wash and shampoo
